output: Go to Student → Add Student, fill in the required personal and academic details, then click Save to create the student record.
Navigate to Student → Student List, select the student, click Edit, update details, and save.
Open Student → Student List, select the student record, click Delete, and confirm the deletion.
Go to Student → Student List to view all registered students.
Use the search bar in Student → Student List by entering name, register number, or ID.
Admission module is used to manage student enrollment including personal data and academic details.
Go to Admission module → New Admission, fill in student info, choose program, upload documents, and save.
In Admission module → Admission List, select a student, click Edit, update details, and save.
In Admission module → Admission List, choose the record and click Print to generate a printable form.
Go to Reports → Select report type → Choose filters → Click Generate Report.
Open a generated report and use the Print option at the top right corner.
Navigate to Reports → Choose module → Apply filters → Generate.
Go to My Subject → Add Subject → Enter subject details → Save.
My Subject → Subject List → Edit → Update details → Save.
Go to My Class → Assign Subjects → Choose class → Assign.
My Class → Add Class → Fill class details → Save.
Go to My Class → Class List.
My Mentees → Add Mentee → Select student → Save.
My Mentees → Mentee List.
COE → Hall Ticket Approval → Select students → Approve.
COE → Hall Ticket → Choose exam → Generate.
Elective Waiver → Select student → Approve requested elective waiver.
Course Registration → New Registration → Select student → Add courses → Save.
Course Registration → Registration List → Edit → Update courses → Save.
Course Registration → Registration List → Print.
Academic → Reports → Choose report → Apply filters → Generate.
Student → Student List → Select student → Print ID card.
Academic → Attendance → Select class → Mark students present/absent → Save.
Academic → Attendance → Attendance Reports → Select class/date → View.
Go to Profile → Edit → Update details → Save.
